Detailed Description

Returns an iterator on the latest waveform data stored by a request of a waveformTread for a given cluster.

The data correspond to the time frame display mode (ll the spikes in a given time frame are available). Caution: in Qt graphical coordinate system, the Y axis is inverted (increasing downwards), thus a point (x,y) as to be drawn and tested as (x,-y). The value returns by the iterator is the spike sample value taking the Qt graphical coordinate system into consideration, the ordinate coordinate is the opposite of the raw data.
